21.4.2. The MPI ABI Fortran Modules and Shared Library


Up: The Fortran Application Binary Interface Next: The Status Object Previous: Fortran Type Registration

The ABI must be implemented using modules named mpi and mpi_f08. The MPI library that implements the standard ABI must be named mpifort_abi and follow all of the requirements stated in Section The MPI ABI Header File and Shared Library for naming, versioning, and dependencies.
